titleStmt.title: The late Lord Chief Justice North's argument in the case between Sir William Soames, sheriff of Svffolk and Sir Sam. Barnardiston, Bar. adjudged in the court of exchequer-chambers upon a writ of error containing the reasons of that judgement.
titleStmt.author: Guilford, Francis North, Baron, 1637-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and are to be sold by Randal Taylor,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
